description:
Want to install the world's favorite Learning Management System Moodle - on your own laptop or desktop inexpensively - to learn, experiment and have some fun doing it?

Have you been frustrated trying to install Apache, PHP, MySQL and Moodle - without the easy documentation - reduced to pulling out your hair and tears?

Whatever your motivation to install Moodle on Windows, you've come to the right place.

This course will teach you to install Moodle on Windows - or your money back.

UNTIL you learn how to do it - installing the full technology stack needed - i.e. Apache, PHP and MySQL - followed by Moodle can be a exercise in frustration, patience and endless sifting through lots of documentation, forums and error messages.

This course will save you countless hours trying to install all that is needed for Moodle. We will start right from the very beginning and go till the end.

What you learn in this course (Apache, PHP, MySQL) - you can then use to install hundreds of other popular Open Source projects like Wordpress, Drupal and Joomla - to just name 3.

Install the Full Technology Stack needed for Moodle - and then reuse it as much as you like!
  • Start from the very basics - this course makes no assumptions
  • Learn new skills - Become indispensable in your institution
  • BONUS lessons - Essential beginner Moodle admin lessons added

What am I going to get from this course?

  1. A step-by-step video tutorial starting from the absolute basics - all the way to completion
  2. Countess hours saved learning to install on your own - from hundreds of forums, often outdated instructions, unhelpful error messages.
  3. Respect of your peers, students, school administrators - and everyone who will benefit from your learning.
  4. Learning this tech stack opens the doors for installing fantastic open source projects for you - some of which include Wordpress, Drupal, Joomla.
  5. A lifetime access to this course - and all future updates, enhancements
  6. BONUS: Some simple Moodle Admin lessons included - more will be coming.
  7. Tips, tricks, pitfalls and other points distilled from a lot of experience - these are distributed through out the course lessons
title: Moodle: Learn to Host on  any Windows Computer
